item.title: PDF scraping with pdftools and purrr
item.description: I thought this would make as good a debut post as any for the new site. Here’s the challenge: My partner is, like many of us, taking the extended pandemic lockdown/recovery as an opportunity to catch up on some learning — and though I’m lucky enough to be working from home too, I’ve also been looking for ways to feel like I’m doing more than just passing time. As a result, we’ve used our subscriptions budget to sign up to Great Courses Plus, which is essentially geeky version of Netflix, streaming lecture series instead of shows.
